effect: Damage weapon armor or shield (ignore hardness)
Entangled in equipment (standard action to free self)
fling weapon (1d8 direction; 1d20 distance;damage first person hit; 1-5 damage self!)
backblast - the attack hits you and is a critical threat
critical mistake - the attack hits you and is a critical threat
out of position - you cannot use this attack again
mind drain - take int wis or cha damage
off-balance - take a -4 penalty on all attack rolls
friendly fire - attack closest ally to target
broke a nail - take damage; cannot use thi attack again until healed
power drain - randomly lose one prepared spell or spell lost
spilled ammo - drop all ammo from active ammo container
just a taste - hit an ally adjacent to target
fist meets face - critical threat self
distance rift - teleported to the nearest square adjacent to the target
